principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Netflix utility with Awwwards-level aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction feels 'heavy' and premium.
Content is King: The UI recedes; the artwork dominates.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to frame colorful content.
anti_patterns: No boring equal-height grids everywhere (Use 'Tetris' grid).

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Movie titles

colors.theme_strategy: Cinematic Dark (Default) with Editorial Light toggle

trending_tetris.description: Asymmetric grid for 'Trending Now'. Mix sizes.

tech_stack_instructions.routing: react-router-dom (Use HashRouter for GitHub Pages compatibility)

implementation_steps.step_1: Setup Global Styles (Fonts, Colors in index.css). Install dependencies: `yarn add react-player framer-motion @studio-freight/lenis axios`.
implementation_steps.step_2: Create 'AuthContext' to simulate login/signup and persist to localStorage.
implementation_steps.step_3: Build 'TMDB Service' (api.js) to fetch Trending, Top Rated, Search, Details.
implementation_steps.step_4: Develop Core Components: Navbar (transparent to solid), Hero (Parallax), MovieCard (Hover effects).
implementation_steps.step_5: Build Pages: Home (Rows), Search (Grid), Details (Modal/Page with Player).
implementation_steps.step_6: Deploy strategy: Ensure `package.json` has `homepage` field set to GitHub Pages URL.

tmdb_config.note: Use 'api_key' as query param. Handle 404s gracefully.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
